name: Plant Pals
description:
Plant Pals is a fast-paced game all about companion planting! Race against time as the crop-destroying monster hunts down your weak plants!

Plant Pals has been created as a submission for the REGENERATE Game Jam.
Our objective in this project was to create a game with a concept based on Regenerative Farming. We decided to centralize our theme on “Companion Planting”. 

Plant Pals takes place on a rural countryside farm, where a farmer is being terrorized by “The Crop Destroying Monster” who is decimating wimpy unsustainable crops. 

These crops need a farmer who knows how to efficiently use Companion Planting to plant different crops in the raised beds, strengthening them and making sure no monster can destroy them!

Will the farmer plant Companion Plants in the correct raised bed in time before “The Crop Destroying Monster” decimates the crops? ....or will “The Crop Destroying Monster” win again?

Controls:

WASD = Move Character
SHIFT = Sprint
MOUSE = Move Camera
E = Pickup/Plant Vegetables

DEVELOPING TEAM
